name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. William Henry SHUPP, III, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gary Neil Asteak, Easton, Robert M. Rosenblum, Stroudsburg, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
459 A.2d 756
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. William Henry SHUPP, III, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 28, 1983.
Decided May 10, 1983.
Gary Neil Asteak, Easton, Robert M. Rosenblum, Stroudsburg, for appellant.
William H. Platt, Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
